public abstract class AbstractOpenSpMessageParser
extends Object

Description copied from interface: OpenSpErrMessageParser
Invokes ANTLR-generated grammar class to parse OpenSP-generated .err file

Specified by:
parseMessageFile in interface OpenSpErrMessageParser
Parameters:
messageFilePath - path to OpenSP-generated .err file
sgm - SgmlModule to which messages can be attached
Throws:
JHOVE2Exception

createMessageString

public static String createMessageString(String fileName,
                                         String lineNumber,
                                         String posNumber,
                                         String messageText)
Same as createCodedMessageString(fileName, lineNumber, posNumber, messageText, null, null)

Parameters:
fileName - String with SGML or DTD file name
lineNumber - line in file to which message pertains
posNumber - position in line to which message pertains
messageText - text of message
Returns:
formatted string containing message information

createCodedMessageString

public static String createCodedMessageString(String fileName,
                                              String lineNumber,
                                              String posNumber,
                                              String messageText,
                                              String messageLevel,
                                              String messageCode)
Takes components of message string generated by OpenSp and creates formatted message string

Parameters:
fileName - String with SGML or DTD file name
lineNumber - line in file to which message pertains
posNumber - position in line to which message pertains
messageText - text of message
messageLevel - message Level/Type (Error, warning, info, xref, Name(quantity)length issue)
messageCode - message code assigned by OpenSp
Returns:
formatted string containing message information

isMessageCode

public static boolean isMessageCode(String messageLevel)
Test to see if String is a message code

Parameters:
messageLevel -
Returns:
true if String is a message code, else false
